isActive.description: If the plan is not active, customers cannot subscribe to the plan (default to true)

richDescription.description: The plan rich description - supports HTML

recurringAmount.description: The amount that recurs according to the schedule

recurringPeriodLength.description: The length of time (used with the recurringPeriodUnit)

trialAmount.description: The amount of a trial - 0 is a valid value (for free)

trialPeriodLength.description: The length of time (used with the trialPeriodUnit)

setupAmount.description: The amount of a trial - 0 is a valid value (for free)

expiredTime.description: Time when the plan is not longer valid

contractTermLength.description: The length that corresponds with the contractTermUnit

recurringPeriodLimit.description: The number of times a subscription will rebill until the contract is over

minQuantity.description: Minimum quantity per order, defaults to 1

maxQuantity.description: Maximum quantity per order (NULL if no maximum)
